fact-2.value: Our Purpose is to deliver value  beyond measure. Precision is at the heart of what we  do. Spectris provides customers  with specialist insight through our  high-tech instruments and test equipment, augmented by the  power of our software. We enable our customers to work faster, smarter and more efficiently.  We equip them with the ability to innovate, reduce time to market, improve processes, quality and yield.In this way, our know-how creates value for wider society, as our customers manufacture and develop new products to make the world cleaner, healthier and more productive.
